document_data.name: Ammon
document_data.mainbody: '''Ammon''' was a scholar who was active on the [[Sword Coast]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: Among her endeavors, Ammon sought to create an [[alchemical]] solution that could reveal scripts that had been concealed by [[magic]]al means.
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Ammon ventured into the ancestral tombs of the Korlasz family, in order to find reagents for her experiments. She was accompanied for some time by one of the mercenaries that worked for the individual referred to as [[Korlasz]], but she was alone in a library for her own safety.

Ammon set out on this mission as she wanted to use her concoction on a specific [[book]] that originated from [[Netheril]], found within the great library-fortress of [[Candlekeep]].
